CantSaveReport.Text: Can't save the report. The file may be write-protected.

ClassError.Text: Could not find the main report class, ReportScript

DelegateError.Text: {0} delegate must have two arguments: 'sender' and 'e'

DeleteAncestor.Text: Could not delete {0}, it was introduced in the ancestor report

DuplicateStyle.Text: Style witch such name already exists

EventError.Text: Could not create event handler due to errors in source code

MatrixError.Text: {0}: Matrix object must have at least one column or row and one cell dimensions.

MatrixValueError.Text: Number of values differs from MatrixData.Cells.Count (must be {0})

ParentError.Text: Object of type {0} cannot contain objects of type {1}

ParentError1.Text: Object of type {0} cannot contain objects

RenameAncestor.Text: Could not rename {0}, it was introduced in the ancestor report

SaveChangesToPreviewPage.Text: Save changes to the preview page?

TableIsNull.Text: Table is not connected to the data. Register the data using Report.RegisterData method.

TableManualBuildError.Text: You can use TableObject.PrintRow, PrintColumn methods inside its ManualBuild event only.

WrongFileFormat.Text: Cannot load the file. Unknown file format

DuplicateName.Text: Item with such name already exists

Password.Text:
This report is password protected.
Please enter the password:

SelectDataSource.Text: Select one of the available datasources or create new one:

SelectColumns.Text: Select data columns that you want to show in a report.

Hint.Text: Choose the line style and choose the line to apply the style.
Click an item to set up its properties:

NoSettings.Text: No specific settings for this series type.

NewArea.Text: Add new chart area for this series

Warning.Text: Labels do not fit on the page!

NoData.Text:
No datasources available.
Go "Data|Choose Report Data..." menu to choose from available datasources, or create new datasource using "Data|Add Data Source..." menu.

WhichData.Text: Which data connection should your report use to connect to the database?

Hint.Text: Select from list of last used connections, or press "New connection..." button to create new connection.

WhichTables.Text: Which tables you want in your report?

Select data column or type an expression:

Hint.Text: What will happen if you click this object in the preview window:

HintPageNumber.Text: You will go to the specified page.

HintBookmark.Text: You will go to the object that contains specified bookmark.

HintReport.Text: Specified report will be opened in separate preview tab.

HintReportPage.Text: Specified page will be generated and opened in separate preview tab.

HintCustom.Text: You should create "Click" event handler to define custom action.

ModifyAppearance.Text: Modify the object's appearance so it will look like a clickable link

Hint.Text: Select one of the predefined labels, or press "Custom label..." button to define own label size.

FileHint2.Text: Note: you have to deploy this file together with your report.

Note.Text: Note: changes made will take effect on FastReport restart.

Apply.Text: Apply to all pages and rebuild report

SavePrinter.Text: Save this printer in the report file

Hint.Text: Enter page numbers and/or page ranges, separated by commas. For example, 1,3,5-12

SetName.Text: Set the name of the query object.

NameHint.Text: This name will be displayed in the "Data" window.

WhatData.Text: What data should return the query?

TypeSql.Text: Type your SQL statement or use the Query Builder to construct it.

EvaluateCondition.Text: Evaluate if the following condition is met:
